title: wine_Columbia_Crest_2007_Stone_Tree_Vineyard_Reserve_Cabernet_Sauvignon_(Columbia_Valley_(WA))
text:
Unnamed: 0: 32322.
country: US.
description: This wine surprises by being so very pretty—unexpected from such a hot site. Lovely scents of raspberry, strawberry, mint and spice lift the nose; the palate is medium-bodied, nicely tart, perfectly balanced and long. The mix of sweet and tart red fruits lasts deliciously, with the spice adding grace notes. Though blended and aged in 100% new French oak barrels, the oak is muted, and the fruit shines through..
designation: Stone Tree Vineyard Reserve.
points: 91.
price: 35.0.
province: Washington.
region_1: Columbia Valley (WA).
region_2: Columbia Valley.
taster_name: Paul Gregutt.
taster_twitter_handle: @paulgwine .
title: Columbia Crest 2007 Stone Tree Vineyard Reserve Cabernet Sauvignon (Columbia Valley (WA)).
variety: Cabernet Sauvignon.
